author: Misty (Hip Sidekick)
title: OVER 50% Off Vera Bradley Semi-Annual Sale | Sling Backpack ONLY $30 (Reg. $65)
text:
OVER 50% Off Vera Bradley Semi-Annual Sale | Sling Backpack ONLY $30 (Reg. $65)
Hip2Save may earn a small commission at no extra cost to you via trusted partners and affiliate links in this post. Prices and availability are accurate as of time posted.
Read our full disclosure policy here.
It’s time to bag up some deals at Vera Bradley!
For a limited time, hurry on over to
VeraBradley.com where you can score up to 50% off select styles during their Semi-Annual Sale!
Even better, there are several items on sale for up to 60% off during a last-chance sale AND you can save 30% off Disney Pixar & Peanuts items through January 21st too!
Plus, shipping is free on orders over $99 OR you can get free 2-day shipping on a $75 order through
Shoprunner!
HIP TIP: Watch for a pop-up window that will ask you to sign up for text alerts! If you opt to receive texts from Vera Bradley you will be given a unique promo code for an additional 15% off — and YES, you can use the code on items featured in the Semi-Annual Sale! *Note that this promo does not work on last chance, Disney/Pixar, or Peanuts items.
Check out these awesome Vera Bradley Semi-Annual Sale deals…

Use your unique 15% off code
